mu.fi.sybila.esther.heart.widget

Interface EstherWidget


  • public interface EstherWidget
    Author:
    George Kolcak Interface for Esther Widgets.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String[] allowedChildren(String type)
      Specifies the possible subfile types of the file in question.

      Checks the provided widgets for possible dependencies.

      Returns unique identifier of the Esther Widget.

    • Method Detail

      • getIdentifier

        String getIdentifier()
        Returns unique identifier of the Esther Widget.
        Returns:
        Esther Widget identifier.

      • checkDependencies

        void checkDependencies(List<EstherWidget> widgets)
        Checks the provided widgets for possible dependencies.
        Parameters:
        widgets - The list of Esther Widgets present in the system.

      • opensFile

        boolean opensFile(String type)
        Determines whether the specified file type is opened by the Esther Widget.
        Parameters:
        type - The extension of the file in question.
        Returns:
        True if the specified file is opened by the Esther Widget. False otherwise.

      • allowedChildren

        String[] allowedChildren(String type)
        Specifies the possible subfile types of the file in question.
        Parameters:
        type - The extension of the file in question.
        Returns:
        List of file extensions of the allowed subfiles for the given file.

      • startWidget

        String startWidget(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap map,
                 Long id,
                 Long parent)
        Opens the given file in the widget.
        Parameters:
        map - The map of UI properties.
        id - The ID of the file to be opened.
        parent - The Parent of the file to be opened. Or null if the file is root.
        Returns:
        The Esther Widget UI page.
